languages.text: "Неумирающий... не шептал его имени. Я сама решила оборвать его нить".

traits.locale_text: "Неумирающий... не шептал его имени. Я сама решила оборвать его нить".

languages.text: "The Undying One... never whispered his name. I myself decided to sever his thread."
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий... не шептал его имени. Я сама решила оборвать его нить".

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One... never whispered his name. I myself decided to sever his thread."

languages.text: « L'Immortel... n'a jamais murmuré son nom. J'ai moi-même pris la décision de couper son fil. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One... never whispered his name. I myself decided to sever his thread."

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel... n'a jamais murmuré son nom. J'ai moi-même pris la décision de couper son fil. »

languages.text: «El Inmortal... no susurró su nombre. Fui yo la que decidió cortar su hilo».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One... never whispered his name. I myself decided to sever his thread."

traits.locale_text: «El Inmortal... no susurró su nombre. Fui yo la que decidió cortar su hilo».

languages.text: 「不死の者が…奴の名を囁いたことはない。私が奴の糸を断ち切ると決めたのよ」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One... never whispered his name. I myself decided to sever his thread."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者が…奴の名を囁いたことはない。私が奴の糸を断ち切ると決めたのよ」

languages.text: “不死之神……并没有低声诉说他的名字，是我自己决定要割断他的丝线。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One... never whispered his name. I myself decided to sever his thread."

traits.locale_text: “不死之神……并没有低声诉说他的名字，是我自己决定要割断他的丝线。”

languages.text: "Der Todlose ... hat niemals seinen Namen geflüstert. Ich selbst habe beschlossen, seinen Faden zu durchtrennen."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One... never whispered his name. I myself decided to sever his thread."

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose ... hat niemals seinen Namen geflüstert. Ich selbst habe beschlossen, seinen Faden zu durchtrennen."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen... O'nun ismini fısıldamadı. İpliğini koparmaya bizzat karar verdim."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One... never whispered his name. I myself decided to sever his thread."
